landing.socialWorkerHeadingDesc: The platform serves the social workers to obtain professional licenses electronically and to benefit from the Ministry's services more effectively.
landing.servicesDesc: This platform provides a set of electronic services to improve and facilitate procedures related to the licensing of social practitioners.
landing.missionAndVisionDesc: The Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development seeks to actively develop the capabilities of its employees in order to keep pace with the aspirations of the ambitious vision of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Since the Ministry has most of the social institutions and the entire non-profit social institutions operate under its supervision, it leads the process of the social work profession in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

ORC.questionnaire.q1: Are you willing to do the social work atleast 15 days a month?

ORC.questionnaire.q3: Are you comfortable in working in teams?
ORC.questionnaire.q4: Are you comfortable in working in an environment with no internet?
ORC.questionnaire.q5: Will you be available for social work on weekends?
